title: Update failed
body: I wanted to play league but then i got a pvp patcher problem and i fixed it but then when i was trying to update the new patch it starts and then it crash and tells me unspecified error occurred and i deleted and installed league a couple of times and it keeps doing it. Someone pls help me find a solution

replies.body: I also have the same problem Mine stops at % 1.
I'd like to help but need a little more information.  At what % are you receiving the unspecified error?  This will help pinpoint where the issue is coming from.  Let me know!
each time it stops on a different %
it never happned to me it's the first time and it's like this for whole day i tried like  6 times to reinstall league amd 20 times to update and it still crashed
